name: Archer

skills.name: Double Shot
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has an extra 15% chance of inflicting a critical hit. Fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 15% if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Rain of Arrows
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies 2 times. Has a 10% chance to place a 15% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 7 Damage +15%
Lvl. 8 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

seo.description: Banner-Lords is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 33 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Hereditary Knights of Kaerok, the Banner Lords swear blindallegiance to King Tayba. His majesty has tasked them withwaging his war of expansion, and protecting the royaladministrators posted at Kaerok Castle. These fearsome knightswill let no soul pass without a royal scroll.
